name: Research Agent Evaluation Suite
description: Test cases to verify the research orchestrator follows the correct workflow

eval_cases.name: Basic Research Query
eval_cases.description: Verifies agent uses all three sub-agents in correct order for a simple research request

parts.text: Research the benefits of renewable energy and give me a brief report.

A report on renewable energy benefits including environmental advantages like reduced carbon emissions, economic benefits such as job creation and energy cost savings, and energy security through reduced dependence on fossil fuels. The report should be well-structured with sections and include source citations.

eval_cases.name: Multi-Source Research
eval_cases.description: Verifies agent properly analyzes multiple sources before reporting

parts.text: Compare electric vehicles vs hybrid vehicles. I need a summary of the pros and cons of each.

A comparison report covering electric vehicles (EVs) and hybrid vehicles. Should include pros and cons for each: EVs offer zero emissions, lower fuel costs, but have range limitations and charging infrastructure concerns. Hybrids provide better fuel economy than traditional cars, no range anxiety, but still use gasoline and have complex drivetrains. Report should be formatted as a comparison with clear sections or a table.

eval_cases.name: Executive Summary Request
eval_cases.description: Verifies agent produces properly formatted executive summary through full workflow

parts.text: I need an executive summary on current trends in artificial intelligence for my team meeting.

An executive summary covering current AI trends such as generative AI and large language models, AI in enterprise applications, advances in computer vision, ethical AI and regulation developments, and AI infrastructure and computing requirements. Should be concise, formatted for executive audience with key findings highlighted, and include sources.
